headline: What Analysts Think Is Resetting The Story For Clorox (CLX)
summary: The latest update on Clorox trims the modelled fair value estimate slightly, from US$124.59 to US$122.41, as analysts factor in softer revenue growth assumptions of 1.39% versus 1.43% previously. This small adjustment reflects a tug of war between cautious views, tied to weaker Q1 results and a lower end EPS outlook, and more constructive voices who see reset expectations and clustered targets in the low to mid US$120s as a sign that the story is being recalibrated rather than abandoned. Stay...
